thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Judge Approves N.J.-Exxon Settlement

author: Kate King
title: Judge Approves N.J.-Exxon Settlement
text:
A New Jersey judge approved a $225 million settlement on Tuesday between Gov. Chris Christie’s administration and Exxon Mobil Corp. to end a legal battle over polluted sites, a deal environmentalists denounced as grossly inadequate.
Superior Court Judge Michael Hogan described the settlement in his ruling as “fair, reasonable, in the public interest” and consistent with a state law that seeks to protect New Jersey’s natural resources...
